PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Agfa Superpan Supreme safety film
CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 6, 1941, pg. 17, reads: "Harry Bobo, young heavyweight fighter, who fights Bill Poland at Forbes Field September 15. If the local heavyweight star can deefat [defeat] the invader from Baltimore, he may fight Abe Simon or Buddy Baer."
TitMainTitle: Boxer Harry Bobo seated in locker room
